Begin Meditation
Consider your options carefully before selecting an Advanced Class.
Choose Sniper as your Advanced Class. Snipers are skilled with high-caliber rifles and use advanced weaponry. They excel at battlefield control, sustained and burst damage from a distance.
Choose Operative as your Advanced Class. Operatives are skilled with energy weapons and infiltration tech. They excel at stealth, healing and inflicting damage in close combat.
Choose Powertech as your Advanced Class. Powertechs are skilled with flamethrowers and advanced shield technology. They excel at ranged defense and inflicting damage in close combat.

Choose Mercenary as your Advanced Class. Mercenaries are skilled with dual pistols and use an array of weapons and gadgets. They excel at battlefield control, healing and sustained damage from a distance.

Choose Sith Sorcerer as your Advanced Class. Sorcerers are skilled with Force Lightning and channeling dark afflictions. They excel at healing, battlefield control and sustained damage from a distance.
Choose Sith Assassin as your Advanced Class. Assassins are skilled with double-bladed lightsabers and use the Force to deceive opponents. They excel at stealth and inflicting damage in close combat.

Choose Sith Marauder as your Advanced Class. Marauders are skilled with dual lightsabers, focusing their rage into powerful melee attacks. They excel at inflicting burst and sustained damage in close combat.

Choose Sith Juggernaut as your Advanced Class. Juggernauts are skilled with lightsabers, heavy armors and using fear as a weapon. They excel at battlefield control, defense and survival in close combat.
Choose Jedi Sage as your Advanced Class. Sages are skilled with telekinetics and use the Force to maintain balance. They excel at healing, battlefield control and sustained damage from a distance.

Choose Jedi Shadow as your Advanced Class. Shadows are skilled with double-bladed lightsabers, channeling the Force in melee combat. They excel at stealth, survival and inflicting damage in close combat.

Choose Jedi Sentinel as your Advanced Class. Sentinels are skilled with dual lightsabers, drawing on the Force to enhance their reflexes. They excel at inflicting burst and sustained damage in close combat.
Choose Jedi Guardian as your Advanced Class. Guardians are skilled with lightsabers, heavy armors and combat discipline. They excel at battlefield control, defense and survival in close combat.
Choose Gunslinger as your Advanced Class. Gunslingers are skilled with dual pistols and outlawed weapons. They excel at battlefield control, sustained and burst damage from a distance.
Choose Scoundrel as your Advanced Class. Scoundrels are skilled with scatterguns and using luck to their advantage. They excel at stealth, healing and inflicting damage in close combat.
Choose Commando as your Advanced Class. Commandos are skilled with massive assault cannons and combat morale. They excel at survival, healing and sustained damage from a distance.
Choose Vanguard as your Advanced Class. Vanguards are skilled with assault rifles and use advanced shield technology. They excel at ranged defense and inflicting damage in close combat.
